name: Union White
description: OpalSky delivers comfort, durability, and style with the Union pants. Designed with a special, next-gen blend of high-performance synthetic fabrics, these pants are enduringly fashionable in these modern times.
description_cn: 欧珀空为你带来舒适、耐用而时尚的联盟工装裤。这条采用了特殊的次时代高强度人工合成面料的裤子能够给予你在现代社会中最耐用的时尚和最时尚的耐用.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-Aparelli
